title: Goalkeeper Mary Earps to leave Man Utd and join PSG - BBC Newsround
snippet: England goalkeeper Mary 'Queen of stops' Earps is set to leave Manchester United and sign for French club Paris St-Germain

title: Mary Earps - Wikipedia
snippet: She and Paris Saint-Germain lost 5–2 on aggregate to Juventus in the 2024–25 UEFA Women's Champions League qualifying rounds. On 12 November 2025, Earps returned to Manchester United in the Champions League for the first time since her move, where they lost 2-1.

title: Mary Earps transfer: Manchester United and England goalkeeper to join PSG at end of contract | Transfer Centre News | Sky Sports
snippet: England goalkeeper Mary Earps will leave Manchester United Women at the end of her contract to join PSG; Earps is the third big name to leave United on a free transfer over the last 12 months after Alessia Russo and Ona Batlle both departed ...

title: Hannah Hampton over Mary Earps as England No 1: Chelsea goalkeeper has quality but Euro 2025 is bigger test | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Hannah Hampton will be the Lionesses first-choice goalkeeper at Euro 2025 having taken over from Mary Earps; in conversation with former England international Sue Smith, Adam Bate looks at the challenge facing the new No 1 following Earps' abrupt ...

title: Mary Earps transfer: Man Utd and England goalkeeper leaves club and set to join Paris Saint-Germain | Transfer Centre News | Sky Sports
snippet: Mary Earps has left Manchester United Women following the expiry of her contract and is set to join Paris Saint-Germain.
